sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Col, Row, Container, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' function ProductsScreen({ match }) { const [data, setData] = useState({}); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setData(res.data[0]) setLoading(false) } catch (err) { throw new Error(err.message) } } fetchData(); }, [match.params.id]); if (loading) { return (<>) } return ( <> {data.name} = 0.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 0 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 1.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 1 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 2.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 2 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 3.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 3 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 4.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 4 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> {` `}{data.numReviews} reviews Price : {data.price} $ description : {data.description} Price {data.price} $ Status {data.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Disabled"} 0 ? false : true} style={{ textAlign: 'center' }}> ) } export default ProductsScreen
